result.title: include using namespace std; int main (){ int N,t,q=0; cin
result.content:
include<bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; int main (){ int N,t,q=0; cin>>N>>t; int a[N]; for(int n=0;n<N;n++) cin>>a[n]; while(t>q){ for(int n=0;n<N;n=n+2){ if(a[n]=="B" && a[n+1]=="G") a[n+1]=="B"; a[n]=="G"; } q++; } for(int n=0;n<N;n++) cout<<a[n]; return 0;
}
